name: No Parking
description:
NoParking is a diverse and unbored classic casual puzzle game.


The way to play NoParking is quite similar to a classic Chinese game called "Hua Rong Dao", it is easy to learn but hard to master, you need think over and keep trying to get through puzzles.

You will be counted in each puzzle stage,so just be faster in your game to refresh your record to be the king of ranking.

The vision of Brick is bright, is suitable for all ages, especially for the teenagers as it brings them either relaxation or practice, hundreds of different stages will absolutely make you enjoyable!
